title: Aviator Irelia Splash
body:
https://lolstatic-a.akamaihd.net/frontpage/apps/prod/rg-irelia-reveal/en_US/799921fe5991a64214c73a22b7df421f4230b6be/assets/img/content/wallpaper/aviator-splash.jpg

I don't know who made the splash art for Aviator Irelia, but damn they did an amazing job! I'm not often amazed by splash arts, but this is something else, absolutely loving it. Aviator Irelia has always been my favorite skin concept in the game, I hope the ingame model will be just as stunning as the splash!

Irelia hype!

okay here is feedback from two guys who bring the criticism about frostblade irelia to the point:

The things that make me dislike this change so much is:

-The colours are horribly muted and wishy-washy in comparison. The old skin had strong definition due to the contrast between the dark blue of the bodysuit and the colour of her armour. The new one just feels like a blob of colour.

-The fur is far too much and is not balanced (both colour and size-wise) and pretty much becomes the entirety of the skin as of the moment.

-The skin easily clashes with the style from other skin lines (and does it worse) like winter wonder karma and woad quinn (as pointed out by OP).

[_this and: _]

My problems with it.

She looks like Shyvana

-That white scarf on her arm and waste looks stupid

-She should be blue NOT purple

-Her hair looks awful

-The crystal helmet is dumb and should be removed

-Face doesn't look like Irelia

-Pose looks weird, it's like Sivir all over again

[_this. two comments i found i think they bring it to the point - the last one is from reddit. _]

**since you take care about the community and always look take criticism seriously and constructive cause you are a company who cares about the community, read this and give this feedback to the responsible persons.**

thanks for say who is the artist. I have a nice idea for next splash art works: You guys should put in a bottom corner a sign of  the artist that created the splash art.{{sticker:poppy-wink}}

My pleasure, Jungler Soul.  Signing splashes or attributing them isn't something I can do in the client, but I can definitely help you out.  Feel free to ask me here on the forums anytime, I love sharing the work of my art heroes.

Hi OwleyCat,

This is a strange request for a bit of an old project of yours, but it will mean a ton to my content-starved heart if I end up getting something. 

I know that wonderful Marquis Vlad splash (blonde hair blue coat one) was a collab with Viktor Titov, but I wondered if, like with other splashes, there were several draft variants produced before you agreed on a composition? If yes can you find them and share them? Thank you so much, /r/Vladimirmains absolutely adore the art and we can definitely see your touch in it. It got me through some of the darkest weeks of my life because just looking at it reminded me there was joy in this world.

Cheers, 
A fan

Hi Blood Magicks!  One, thank you so much... YOU bring me joy in my dark weeks with your comments.  That is a really cool idea!  I know we did one "behind the scenes" thing before with the reference used in splash art, something that digs into the process of how some of them (like Marquis Vlad) are made would be really neat - I'm ALL about that process!  I'm going to go ask some buddies around the office about how we could do that.  Thank you for the suggestion!

Thank you for replying, and I'm honoured you remember me! I definitely didn't mean an entire "behind the scenes" thing - that would be too much to ask for! It's just that I often see images like these nowadays, e.g. for Varus and a few others(Irelia, Vayne etc):

https://cdnb.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/008/507/409/large/jessica-oyhenart-varus-process01.jpg

And I wondered if you could post all the additional/discarded ones for Marquis Vlad if you still have them somewhere? 

Thanks, and sorry if the search ends up pointless.
